name: iOS.QRCodeRecipe
tagline: Xamarin.iOS recipe to generate a QR code
body:
This is a sample recipe for the [Xamarin Recipe Cook-Off](http://blog.xamarin.com/xamarin-recipe-cook-off/). This sample shows how to generate a QR code and display inside a UIImageView control. Screenshot ------- ![QRCodeScreenshot](https://raw.github.com/dannycabrera/iOS.QRCodeRecipe/master/Screenshot/QRCodeScreenshot.png) Code ------- The process to generate a QR code is relatively easy. All that is required is the message you want to encode and setting the error correction level. If you need a bit more information on the error correction levels check the [QR code wiki page](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_Code#Error_correction). 1. Generate the QR code ``` var qrGen = new CIQRCodeGenerator (); qrGen.Message = NSData.FromString (textField.Text); qrGen.CorrectionLevel = CorrectionLevel.M.ToString(); ``` Apple Documentation:
https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/GraphicsImaging/Reference/CoreImageFilterReference/Reference/reference.html#//apple_ref/doc/filter/ci/CIQRCodeGenerator
